comments.content:
Twila,   
   
You don't need to e-mail back with the answer, as I have been watching this thread. Turns out I have the font,but hadn't made a sample for the Script Guide yet. I fixed that (also made an Albemarle Plain version). ![AlbemarleSample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141456im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21837.gif)
